LargestContentfulPaint.summary: The LargestContentfulPaint interface provides timing information about the largest image or text paint before user input on a web page.

LargestContentfulPaintElement.summary: The element read-only property of the interface returns an object representing the that is the largest contentful paint.

LargestContentfulPaintId.summary: The id read-only property of the interface returns the ID of the element that is the largest contentful paint.
LargestContentfulPaintId.value: A string containing the ID of the element, or the empty string if there is no such ID.

LargestContentfulPaintLoadTime.summary: The loadTime read-only property of the interface returns the time that the element was loaded.
LargestContentfulPaintLoadTime.value: A representing the time in milliseconds that the element was loaded.

LargestContentfulPaintRenderTime.summary: The renderTime read-only property of the interface represents the time that the element was rendered to the screen.
LargestContentfulPaintRenderTime.value: The renderTime property can have the following values:

LargestContentfulPaintSize.summary: The size read-only property of the interface returns the intrinsic size of the element that is the largest contentful paint.

remarks.para: The size of the element is the width times height of the that this element creates on the screen.

LargestContentfulPaintSize.value: An integer representing the width times height of the element.

LargestContentfulPaintToJSON.summary: The toJSON() method of the interface is a {{Glossary("Serialization","serializer")}}; it returns a JSON representation of the object.
LargestContentfulPaintToJSON.returns: A {{jsxref("JSON")}} object that is the serialization of the object.The JSON doesn't contain the property because it is of type , which doesn't provide a toJSON() operation.

LargestContentfulPaintUrl.summary: The url read-only property of the interface returns the request URL of the element, if the element is an image.
